name: amandio c - Sierpinsky's triangle

wave_0_per_point2=

wave_0_per_point4=c0=equal(c,0);    c1=equal(c,1);
wave_0_per_point5=x1=.5*x1+c0+c1;   y1=.5*y1+c0-c1;

per_frame_6=q3=-q2;      q4=q1;

per_frame_8=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_4=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`uv -= 0.5;
comp_5=`uv *= aspect.xy;    
comp_6=`uv = mul(uv,float2x2(_qa));
comp_7=`uv /= aspect.xy;    
comp_8=`uv += 0.5;
comp_9=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
comp_10=`}
